channel.title: The Ultimate FrumBall Script
channel.description:
PLEASE READ: R0b0t1 originally made this script. I simply added an extra life gainer.
This script has sticky pad support and will easily get you around 5000 points. But now it can get you much further. I added a section that checks how many lives are left. If you only have 1 life left it will type "frumball" Which gives you an extra life. Which can seriously help you out.
Click on the attachment to download (you need to be logged in)

item.title: The Ultimate FrumBall Script

item.description:
